sentences.en: Disease is the child of intemperance.
He thought of her serenity as a foil for his intemperance.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，她的平静反衬出了他的放纵。

sentences.en: Health do not consist with intemperance.
sentences.cn: 健康不放纵,放纵不健康.

sentences.en: Health does not consist with intemperance.
sentences.cn: 健康与纵欲[无节制]不能相容.

sentences.en: Health does not ist with intemperance.
sentences.cn: 健康和放纵,彼此不相容.

sentences.en: Her intemperance will entail the curse of insanity upon her innocent children.
sentences.cn: 她酗酒将给她无辜的孩子带来疯癫的灾祸.

sentences.en: Intemperance is naturally punished with diseases.
sentences.cn: 行为放荡会自然地招致疾病的惩罚.

sentences.en: Intemperance is the parent of many evils.
Many of those who abstain consider smoking a sign of weakness or intemperance.
sentences.cn: 许多戒烟者将吸烟视作软弱或放纵的标志.

sentences.en: Never to master one's anger is a mark of intemperance and lack of training.
sentences.cn: 不能克制怒气是任性和缺乏教养的标志.

sentences.en: Some passions are productive intemperance, others of hate, and still others of both intemperance and hate.
sentences.cn: 有些情欲来自于不知节制, 有些来自于憎恨, 也有一些,同时来自于二者.

sentences.en: What pleases the flesh is gluttony, intemperance, and what contributes to them.
sentences.cn: 能取悦肉体的则是贪吃 、 不知节制以及那些助长这些恶行的事物.
